column2: "Na ɔhen Solomon dzii Israel nyinara do hen."
"Na woyinom nye asafohemfo a onyae; Zadok ne ba Azaria nye ɔsɔfo;"
"Elihoref na Ahija
"na Jehoiada ne ba Benaia na ɔhwɛ dɔm no do; na Zadok na Abiathar nye asɔfo;"
"na Natan ne ba Azaria na ɔhwɛ ahwɛdofo no do; na Natan ne ba Zabud na ɔyɛ ɔsɔfo
"na Ahishar na ɔhwɛ fidua no do; na Abda ne ba Adoniram na ɔhwɛ ɔtowyi edwuma no do."
"Nna Solomon wɔ ahwɛdofo duebien wɔ Israel nyinara do a wɔdze edziban ma ɔhen na ne fidua: nyimpa baako wɔ dɛ ɔma edziban bosoom kor wɔ afrenhyia mu."
"Na hɔn edzin nye yi: Ben-hur wɔ Efraim nkokodo nkurow no mu:"
"Ben-deker
"Ben-hesed
column4: na Hefer asaase nyinara dzi wɔ no:"

column2: "Ben-abinadab
column3: wɔ Dor akoko do nyinara; onyaa Solomon ne babaa Tafat waar no;"

column2: "Ahilud ne ba Baana
column4: na Bɛt-sean nyinara a ɔwɔ Zaretan ne nkyɛn

column2: "Ben-geber
column3: wɔ Ramot-gilead; ɔno na Manaasɛ ne ba Jair no nkurow a ɔwɔ Gilead no
column4: dzi wɔ no: ɔnoara so na Argob asaase a ɔwɔ Bashan
column5: nkurow akɛse eduosia a no ho wɔ afasu na boran adaban no

column2: "Iddo ne ba Ahinadab
"Ahimaaz
column3: wɔ Naftali; ɔno so faa Solomon ne babaa Basemat waar no:"

column2: "Husai ne ba Baana
"Parua ne ba Jehosafat
"Ela ne ba Simei
"Uri ne ba Geber
column4: wɔ Amorifo Sihon na Bashanhen Ɔge ɔman mu; na ɔno nye ɔhwɛdofo kortonoo a ɔwɔ asaase no do."

column2: "Juda na Israel wɔdɔɔ so
column3: hɔn dodow tse dɛ mpoano anhwea
column4: wodzidzi na wɔnom na hɔn enyi gye."

column2: "Na Solomon dzii hen wɔ ahenman a ofi Esutsen no ho nyinara dze kodu Filistiafo asaase do
column3: na Egypt he do: wɔdze ayɛyɛdze bae
column4: na wɔsoom Solomon wɔ no nkwa nda no nyinara mu."

column2: "Na Solomon ne dakor edzidzi ɔyɛ isiam pa etwadze eduasa na eburow isiam etwadze eduosia;"
"anantwi a wɔadɔ seradze du
"Osiandɛ ɔno na ɔwɔ tum wɔ Esutsen no n'afa ha asaase no nyinara do
column3: ofi Tifsa araa dze bodu Gaza
column4: wɔ Esutsen n'afa ha ahemfo nyinara do: na onyaa amandwee wɔ nkyɛnkyɛn nyinara a abɔ no ho aprɔw."

column2: "Na Juda na Israel tsenaa no dwudwoodwo
column3: nyimpa biara wɔ no wenyindua ase na n'adɔmbadua ase

column2: "Na Solomon wɔ ne ntseaseanam ho mpɔnkɔdan mu mpɔnkɔ mpemeduanan
"Na ahwɛdofo no hwehwɛɛ edziban maa ɔhen Solomon
column3: na hɔn a wɔbaa ɔhen Solomon no pon ho nyinara
column4: nyimpa biara wɔ no bosoom mu: wɔmma hwee nnhia."

column2: "Na wɔdze atoko so na efuw a wɔdze ma mpɔnkɔ na mbowa a hɔn ho yɛ har baa beebi mbrɛ ahwɛdofo no wɔwɔ
column3: nyimpa biara dɛ mbrɛ n'ahwɛdodze tse no ara."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn maa Solomon nyansa na ntseasee dodow mbordo
"Na Solomon ne nyansaa so sen bokamba no nyinara hɔn nyansaa
"Nna ɔyɛ nyansafo sen nyimpa nyinara; ɔsen Ezranyi Etan
column6: na Darda: na ne nka tahyee amanaman nyinara mu hyiae."

column2: "Na obubuu mbɛ mpensa: na no ndwom yɛ apem nye enum."
"Na ɔkaa ndua ho asɛm
column3: ofi nkyindur a ɔwɔ Lebanon do araa dze kodu odwonhataw a ofifir fasu mu do: na ɔkaa mbowadoma

column2: "Na aman nyinara mu nyimpa bi baa dɛ woribetsie Solomon ne nyansaa
column3: wofi asaase do ahemfo a wɔtsee ne nyansaa nka no nyinara nkyɛn bae."
